text: Why is this code giving me an "IndentationError: unexpected unindent"

I have tried everything but this peace of code is giving me the IndentationError: unexpected unindent which is weird because the normal error is "undexpected indent" which means as posted many times that its the spacing and how I spaced it so I went through the whole code and nada same error and I put in four spaces correctly and everything still ... nothing.

code:
from bottle import Bottle, run, route, static_file, debug
from mako.template import Template as temp
from mako.lookup import TemplateLookup

lookup = TemplateLookup(directories=[base+'/templates'])
application = Bottle()

if __name__ == '__main__':
    @route('/')
else:
    @application.route('/')
def index():
    index_temp = lookup.get_template('index.html')
